alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:48PM CDT until June 25 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DES MOINES AND NORTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 748 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Augusta, or 8 miles southwest of Burlington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Burlington, West Burlington, Middletown, Gulf Port, Iowa Army Ammunition Plant, Denmark, Augusta, Welter Recreation Area, Spring Grove, Sawyer, Wever, Burlington Regional Airport, Des Moines County Fairgrounds, Camp L-Kee-Ta and Fort Madison Municipal Arpt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
